1254211 1257172 That the technology

1283699 1286618 This is not

1289871 1292082 It's a piece of somebody's life.

1292124 1295961 It's pure and uncut, straight

1306263 1308682 Anything. Whatever you want,

1312060 1314313 but I'm assuming

1314396 1316648 you want to ski,

1572028 1573572 and that'll ruin your whole day.

1930011 1933306 almost as good as

1961542 1963795 This may be

2035450 2037869 Leonard Nero, BLS Limousine

2037952 2040079 I've arranged for

2040163 2042040 Lornette Mason,

2112568 2115613 Yeah. You're going to love it.

2153568 2156195 I need my case.

2162660 2163327 Can we talk a little bit

2163327 2166289 Can we talk a little bit

2175423 2177633 This is cutting off

2198654 2201866 You made me lose it in front

2201949 2203868 Are we still friends?

2209999 2213628 But you just suck people along

2215171 2216797 Don't use the time

2216839 2218633 to think about what

2221719 2225264 Lenny, your ass is always broke,

2225348 2228142 and you're getting strung-out.

2228184 2231687 It's your brain,

2231729 2233981 But not on my watch,

2234023 2236400 I got a child, I got rent...

2238986 2240613 who doesn't send me

2240696 2243199 I'm just trying to hold on here.

2244200 2247078 I know you wouldn't say this

2248329 2251791 You're getting out with Fumitsu,

2255044 2257421 I'll get you to the Templars

2419583 2422878 Show some respect.

2422920 2426340 Important for your label,

2426382 2430136 His records will sell out now,

2435141 2437893 It's not a good idea right now.

2441063 2443858 That's! be between me and Faith.
